mapper.insert: SELECT TTY_SYS_PORTALET_LAYOUT_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL INSERT INTO tty_sys_portalet_layout(ID,USER_ID,PORTAL_ID,SEQUENCE,LAYOUT_TYPE,LAYOUT_SITE,DELETE_FLAG,CREATE_USER,CREATE_USER_DEPT,CREATE_USER_ORG,CREATE_DATE,MODIFY_USER,MODIFY_DATE,EXT_DATE1,EXT_DATE2,EXT_NUM1,EXT_NUM2,EXT_NUM3,EXT_STR1,EXT_STR2,EXT_STR3,EXT_STR4,EXT_STR5) VALUES (#{id},#{userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{portalId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{sequence,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{layoutType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{layoutSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{deleteFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUserDept,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUserOrg,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{modifyUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extDate2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extNum1,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extNum2,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extNum3,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extStr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE tty_sys_portalet_layout set
USER_ID = #{userId},
PORTAL_ID = #{portalId},
SEQUENCE = #{sequence},
LAYOUT_TYPE = #{layoutType},
LAYOUT_SITE = #{layoutSite},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser},
CREATE_USER_DEPT = #{createUserDept},
CREATE_USER_ORG = #{createUserOrg},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
EXT_DATE1 = #{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2 = #{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1 = #{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2 = #{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3 = #{extNum3},
EXT_STR1 = #{extStr1},
EXT_STR2 = #{extStr2},
EXT_STR3 = #{extStr3},
EXT_STR4 = #{extStr4},
EXT_STR5 = #{extStr5},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDateNew} where ID = #{id}
